response: Welcome to the Ola Scooter family, featuring the S1 and S1 Air families. The S1 family offers top-tier design, technology, and performance with a powerful 8.5 kW motor. It includes the OLA S1 Pro, OLA S1 with a 3 kWh battery, and OA S1 with a 2 kWh battery. The S1A family offers the same design and technology at a more affordable price. We've introduced the new S1 scooter with a 2 kWh battery pack, perfect for daily city commutes. The S1 Air family comes in three variants, each with unique specifications. Bookings start from 9th February with deliveries beginning in March 2023.
